ctx: intros f g n x l Hloc Hder.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R_UniformSpace -> R x : R_UniformSpace l : R Hloc : locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t) Hder : f x = l Unable to unify "locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t)" with "g x = l".

ctx: intros f g n x l Hloc Hder.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros f g n x l Hloc Hder. unfold is_derive_n in *. destruct n. - apply Hloc. - apply is_derive_unique with (S n) x l. + apply ex_derive_n_ext_loc with (f:=f) (n:=n) (x:=x) in Hloc. apply Hloc. + apply is_derive_n_unique with (f:=f) (n:=n) (x:=x) (l:=l). apply Hder.
